targets.query: SELECT max(used_percent) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ and "device" != 'rootfs'  and $timeFilter

panels.description: If transporter has been restarted within the last 15 minutes, it will be the number of requests since restart.

styles.alias: Number of requests in past 15 minutes

targets.query: SELECT last("value") - min("value") FROM "transporter.http.requests" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time >= now() - 15m GROUP BY "cluster", "host" fill(none)

panels.title: Requests

panels.description: If Transporter is not indexing, the 15 minute average will reflect the duration of the last successful request from Transporter to elasticsearch.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "transporter.elastic.processor.last_duration" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time >= now() - 15m GROUP BY "cluster", "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Elasticsearch Response Time

panels.description: If transporter has been restarted within the last 15 minutes, it will be the number of failed requests since restart.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") - min("value") FROM /^(transporter.http.requests.rejected|transporter.http.requests.forbidden|transporter.http.requests.too_many|transporter.http.requests.too_many_timeout)/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time >= now() - 15m GROUP BY  "host", "cluster" fill(0)
SELECT last("value") - min("value") FROM "cloudai.failure" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time >= now() - 15m GROUP BY "host", "cluster" fill(0)

panels.title: Failed Requests

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS Total_Alarms
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = Alarm.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(Alarm.DateInserted)
    AND AlarmName.[AlarmRuleGroup] != 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Exclusion des alarmes diagnostics
GROUP BY 
    Entity.Name
ORDER BY 
    Total_Alarms DESC;

USE [LogRhythm_LogMart];
SELECT
  
  [Avg MPS] = CAST(SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs AS BIGINT)) AS real) / CAST(DATEDIFF(ss, $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) AS BIGINT),
  [Max MPS] = CAST(MAX(CountProcessedLogs) AS float) / 60.0
FROM
  [dbo].StatsDeploymentCountsMinute WITH (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate);

SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    A.[AlarmID] AS 'Alarm ID',
    AR.[Name] AS 'Alarm Name'
    
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS A
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AR ON A.[AlarmRuleID] = AR.[AlarmRuleID]
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = A.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(A.[DateInserted])
    AND AR.[AlarmRuleGroup] = 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Alarmes diagnostics
ORDER BY 
    A.[AlarmID] DESC;

targets.query: SELECT   mean(usage_active) as "CPU"   FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean("free") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/  and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(nu
select mean("used") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/  and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)
select mean("total") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/  and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)
select mean("inodes_used"/"inodes_total") from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ /$server$/ and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)
select mean("inodes_used") from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ /$server$/ and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)
select mean("inodes_total") from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ /$server$/ and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk"  WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean("used_percent") as "Memory" FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
